reviewText:
Eh, it's okay for the good price, bought it because we thought it was a volume 3, but it won't work on my dvd player, but on my portable dvd player, i can change the region, so it works on that.

If you wanna buy the portable dvd player i have, see this https://www.amazon.com/Sylvania-SDVD7046-BLUE-Portable-Certified-Refurbished/dp/B075NTMX1W/ref=sr_1_2?s=electronics&ie=UTF8&qid=1518131871&sr=1-2&keywords=Sylvania+SDVD7046-Blue+7-Inch+Portable+DVD+Player+with+Integrated+Handle%2C+Blue
No it was in EU format and did not play I didn't know it was going to be in EU format.?

This disc has 7 shorts on it that are all duplicates from volume 1 and 2. Naming this "Volume 3" with the same basic cover art as Volumes 1 & 2, which are legitimately good sets, is very deceptive since it implies that it is a continuation of new shorts.  Also beware that it's region 2 and 4 and PAL.
Very upset with this I purchased this dvd and it does not work in my dvd player it says CHECH REGIONAL CODE
I didn't understand why there were 8 volumes, yet so little episodes.
not compadible with usa dvd players. It is a region 2 disk made for europe. should be a region 1
